price: 他们说：“我们赞你超绝万物！你是我们的主，而非他们的朋友。他们原当是崇拜精灵的，他们大半信仰精灵。”
arabic: قَالُواْ سُبۡحَٰنَكَ أَنتَ وَلِيُّنَا مِن دُونِهِمۖ بَلۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡبُدُونَ ٱلۡجِنَّۖ أَكۡثَرُهُم بِهِم مُّؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qālū sub'ḥānaka anta waliyyunā min dūnihim bal kānū yaʿbudūna al-jina aktharuhum bihim mu'minūna
